posts.post_title: FS: T210 Series 7 pair: Griffin & Phelan
posts.post_content: For sale:  1910 T210 Old Mill Series 7 pair of cards graded SGC30, Griffin & Phelan.   BOTH CARDS ARE SOLD.    Thank you !    (email: [url]pmkaufman@roadrunner.com[/url])
Both T210 series 7 cards for $180 delivered.
